Episodes.Title: Percy and the Oil Painting
Episodes.Plot: A famous artist comes to the island to paint a picture called `The Spirit of Sodor', and Sir Topham gives Percy the job of showing the artist something special enough to paint.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Rainbow
Episodes.Plot: Thomas sees a beautiful rainbow, and when Edward tells him that something magical is supposed to be at the end, Thomas becomes transfixed.

Episodes.Title: Thomas's Milkshake Muddle
Episodes.Plot: It's the day of the Sodor Summer Party and Thomas has two jobs to do: collect milk to make ice-cream and collect butter from the far side of the island to make cakes, but neither task goes smoothly.

Episodes.Title: Mighty Mac
Episodes.Plot: An unusual new engine with two boilers, Mighty and Mac, starts work on the island.

Episodes.Title: Molly's Special Special
Episodes.Plot: Molly, a new engine on the island, feels silly when she is made to transfer empty trucks back to the plant. Thomas comes up with an idea to make her feel important, but a gust of wind ruins his plans.

Episodes.Title: Respect for Gordon
Episodes.Plot: When Gordon's firebox develops a rattle, the other engines tease him, calling him the Click Clunk Express. Embarrassed, Gordon decides that the other engines need to show him more respect.

Episodes.Title: Thomas and the Birthday Picnic
Episodes.Plot: Sir Topham Hatt is taking his mother for a special birthday picnic and Thomas thinks he knows just the place.

Episodes.Title: Tuneful Toots
Episodes.Plot: Rusty thinks her two-tone horn is very tuneful, but not all the other engines agree.

Episodes.Title: Bold and Brave
Episodes.Plot: Diesel warns Thomas of the "Curse of the Cliffs", just before he's supposed to cross the cliff. But Diesel has also scared Ben with a story that turned out false.

Episodes.Title: Rheneas and the Dinosaur
Episodes.Plot: When some important dinosaur bones are discovered, Mr Percival needs two very careful engines to transport them to the Transfer Yards, and best friends Rheneas and Skarloey are desperate to be chosen.
